column5: Any suggestions for flies I should tie up for smallie fishing at Lady Evelyn?I've read that Hex nymphs are good,but are there any bugs I should take as well?I'll have leech imitations and some standard streamers but would love to hear from an experienced hand about the fly fishing there.Also,last year,I saw some awesome rock bass at the lake--I'll probably take a few smallie breaks from the walleyes,when they slow down,but I wouldn't scoff at the occasional redeye attack if they're like the ones I saw last year before bass season.Thanks Guys---I understand if not many here are fly casters,but I figure there's at least one other like me on this board!
